input.sentences: an old organization is being remodeled .
it 's being turned into a science center .
a lot of work needs to be done here .
hopefully we will have a lot of help .
the center will be called `` science is here ''
output.sentences: Last year we remodeled an old building to use for our organization.
There was also going to be a science center located on the second floor.
It needed a lot of work!
We gave it a lot of love, and care.
The day that the science center was going to begin on their floor, they called, and said it would be too much work, so we got the whole building to ourselves.
